person.persName: John L. Shower (Bowling Green, Kentucky, tailor)

body.p: Bowling Green, Kentucky, tailor. Virginia native. Married to Sarah A. Shower. Owner of John L Shower & Co. in Warren County, Kentucky, in 1865.
